website_summaries.verdict: A stylish wedge style boot that is praised for its quality and versatility.
pros: We love the rich color, beautiful design, and well-constructed quality of this boot
It also stands out for having a good weight that's not too heavy
Has a 2.5-inch heel that is comfortable as well as stylish
cons: The colors are not always as expected, and occasionally a customer has issues with the soles

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these boots! 5/5 for quality, rich color, fit and style. I wear an 8 and ordered a size 8. These fit true to size. I find that a thin to medium thick sock works best for these boots. As always I’m never disappointed by Frye’s.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Bunion Girls, Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: The Carson product line from Frye has been spotty at best with sizing, but these were true to size, with enough room for socks. They are rounded at the toebox, and as someone who has difficulty finding Fryes that don't hurt my bunions, I can tell you...Rejoice! I wore them shopping for five hours with zero bunion pain or aggravation. They are cute, work with bootleg or skinny jeans, and go with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: R. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Frye boots and have always purchased right thru the company but when I saw this price I couldn’t help but try it out. Let me say they fit perfectly, the leather is of the highest quality and buttery soft, and they are as all my other Frye boots going to be a staple in my wardrobe from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynn4487

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boot, good width and foot bed cushion
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot, good width and foot bed cushion. Ordered my usual Frye size. I was worried if the wedge would give enough stability - I have had others that feel rather tippy like you could twist your ankle, but not so with these. Leather I like too, soft and a bit pebbly. I don't know though how the heal and sole are going to ensure. They are made in China, and just don't seem quite the same "last forever" kind of boot like my other made in Mexico Fryes. I will keep them for indoor wear. I think they look good with any kind of pants or skirts, so quite versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Booties - and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I typically wear a 7.5. I ordered an 7.5. They fit great right out of the box. If you are on the fence, don't be. They are fantastic booties. They give a nice amount of height with jeans and also with skinny pants too. Such a beautiful color, too!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sexy wedge
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots, but the toe is a lot more round than I expected from the pictures I saw. The boot does look true to the images though. Amazing quality and stitching, beautiful leather and I love the unique wedge heel design with the zippered back. The ankle space is quite loose though - I would only wear these with skinny legs that would easily fit inside the ankle area. I returned these based on price, the overly round toe (which I thought would be more pointed) and I'm hoping to find them in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Frye Carson Tab Wedge Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these boots...they are top quality leather, attractive and fit perfectly....I can wear them all day with ease and truly enjoy the look and feel! Highly recommend to any women who wants style, comfort and quality at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: B76141

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing amazing!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing amazing!!! One can not say enough wonderful things about this incredible brand. If you are looking for a great wedge bootie to walk on cobblestone in Europe or to just walk and not kill yourself getting a heel stuck in drain hole cover this is the bootie! Speaking of which this cute little wedge will "lift" you assets nicely and comfortably:)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Made in China. Shame on Frye.
customer_reviews.text: Heads up, these ones made in China and they are light and flimsy. If you're used to classic Frye quality you'll be very disappointed. The style was great and I loved the look but the price doesn't match. If they were 45.00...then fine. Sent them back without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: They are....ok
customer_reviews.text: I have had a previous pair of the same show and feel the toe box was a little wider then this. The bottom has absolutely no sole and can be very slippery! I almost want to put a sole on the bottom so I won't fall. I liked my previous pair, but not liking these as much. My feet feel a little tight and numb in them. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: @Oliverbeafromnyc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I saw some of the reviews about it running large. I ordered my normal 8.5 and there's a bit of extra room in the toe but I think if I had ordered an 8 it would be too small and I wouldn't be able to zip up the back. These are so stylish and I've gotten so many compliments already. They are casual yet can be dressy as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Slippery bottom. I had to add something to the soles to keep me from sliddinf when I was walking on hard wood floors. The inside isnt the most comfy either. I feel like I will need extra thick socks to protect my skin and ankles. For this price, I shouldnt have to do that. I wish i could return them but I went out of town and now the return window has closed. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: MK Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not an authentic Frye product
customer_reviews.text: These ARE NOT genuine Frye product!! I have 2 pair of Frye boots, 1 pair of shoes and 2 bags. Their products are made a certain way with a certain quality of leather. Their soles are layered a certain way. This is not it! I received them today and I’m returning them, TODAY I posted pictures but my first review was denied and their already repackaged awaiting UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Want to love these!
customer_reviews.text: first pair the zipper broke first day out...second pair, zipper still sticking...my cobbler said the zipper was sewn wrong, he is fixing and adding wax. Love the style, was replacing an older style that had the zipper on the side and are still my fav boots ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my most comfortable pair of frye boots. The support is perfect and they fit as expected; I didn't have to size up or down. They came brand new in the box and do well with leather waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these boots. I wore them for Thanksgiving for a few hours standing on my feet without any problems. They are super comfortable and I have no regrets. As other reviews mentioned, there is a wide gap on the ankle, but this doesn't bother me enough to send them back. It's hard to find good quality/comfortable shoes. It's worth the money and they will last you a long time if you take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: LMS58

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but disappointed in color :(
customer_reviews.text: This boot fits like a glove and I love the unique leather covered wedge heel. However, I'm disappointed the color doesn't look anywhere as classy or deeply toned as the image shown. :( They are blah brown, and as I decided to return them I saw I've missed the return window. If Frye could advise how to polish them to get the true look as advertised I'd greatly appreciate it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: and I love them! I have somewhat wide ankles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these yesterday, and I love them! I have somewhat wide ankles, so I am always a little concerned when buying boots, but these fit with a little bit of extra room. I wear a size 9 and have somewhat wide feet, but these fit fine even with socks. They feel a touch narrow through the widest part of my foot, but not enough to be uncomfortable. I am sure with wear they will stretch a little, too. These look great with skinny jeans and leggings, and I imagine they would look good with a skirt or dress as well. Perfect everyday bootie!
customer_reviews.author: Allegra Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Frye quality, perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought these, the first shipment was lost in transit or something, but Amazon cust service came through for me and I got a replacement the next day! The heel height is perfect for all day wear and Frye quality can't be beat. I usually wear an 8 1/2 and that size fits fine, the black is beautiful and looks good with skinny jeans and legging/jeggings. I wore them all day at thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin2002

customer_reviews.title: Seriously stylish and surprisingly comfortable. The only downside
customer_reviews.text: CUTE!!! Seriously stylish and surprisingly comfortable. The only downside, is there is NO GRIP... hence the 4 stars. I have to take sandpaper to the front lest I bite it out there! I slid a bit on my friend's tile floor because of the no grip thing. BTW, not a slip on... you do have to unzip the back to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Nan in NV

customer_reviews.title: These boots are beautiful and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful and comfy. I walked around all day in them and my feet started to cramp up a bit, but that's because I have narrow feet, not because of the boot itself. I think if you don't have feet issues like I do, you can wear them all day. They fit as expected and are very stylish. I love wearing them with skinny jeans and slim dress pants. Also cute with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed in the leather
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in the leather. I thought it would be as pictured but it's not. The leather is more grainy than the photo and the toe is far more rounded than pictured. I love Frye products. The fit and quality are apparent. I will wear them but wanted to share in the disappointments so others are aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get your actual size
customer_reviews.text: The FRYE Carson Wedge Bootie is so incredibly beautiful and comfortable. The wedge makes it great for all day, the leather is buttery soft, and great cushion for your feet. Unfortunately I ordered a half size up and it was too big. Stick to your actual size!!! Im a size 7 and ordered a 7.5.....the 7 would have fit perfectly. Because it was a deal of the day when I ordered, I wasn't able to exchange and the price is now double what I paid. Sadly no FRYE boots for me.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyL

customer_reviews.title: Softest boots right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these boots they fit perfectly I’m normally a size 7 I ordered a size 7 they fit great the leather is super soft you can definitely tell it’s a good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy or worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfy boot, had arch pain just ealking around in them for a short time so they went back.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: THESE BOOTS ARE BAE
customer_reviews.text: These boots are everything. They're actually my second identical pair---I loved my first ones so much I had to buy another in case they stop making them! I normally wear an 8.5 in boots but with Frye I always get an 8. They're super sleek and I get compliments on them ALL THE TIME. Great color, goes with everything--black or gray or blue or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Unfortunately they did not have my size ands I tried the next half size up but was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Frye boots before so I knew to buy a 1/2 a size up because I feel they run small. These boots are great quality and the color is gorgeous as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: I returned my first pair (size 10) thinking they were big and got a size 9.5. Should of kept the 10. But the boot itself is top of the line!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: I loved these and they were excellent Frye quality as always
customer_reviews.text: I loved these and they were excellent Frye quality as always, but was looking for a boot with a much lower shaft (i.e., so it doesn't come up quite so high on your ankle). It wasn't the look I was going for on this particular occasion, but there was nothing wrong with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: They seemed perfect. But they did not past the test
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe for my european travels. I wanted something stylish with a little height. They seemed perfect. But they did not past the test. They might be better if you add some type of gel insert or something to add comfort. They are stylish and do add just the right amount of height but as for comfort, they missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: but these look amazing with jeans
customer_reviews.text: they have a pebbled finish and are not smooth, but these look amazing with jeans! This is the first time I bought frye boots off amazon, but they are just as nice as my other pairs of frye boots bought in store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: They were much wider around the ankle than I expected and returned because they didn't look good with dresses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: They run small but after wearing a few times, the leather stretched. These are one of my favorites. They are comfortable now!!
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt like another kind of leather.....dog or goat or something not cowhide. Made on CHINA!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit perfect and are soooo comfortable. They look cute with anything from dresses, jeans to leggings. Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Va

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable boots. I usually wear wide for boots and this boot fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great - they cognac color is very true to the photo and they're very comfortable. Like all Frye products, they're very well made and real leather. Because they're real leather, they easily show spots from water or other liquids. These easily fixed with a damp cloth and light buff. I recommend using Frye's leather cream to keep these in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: MBK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They fit perfect! The leather is soft and the heel is just the right height! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: kandy

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, fits as expected, different quality of leather
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot. Goes with anything. Got the black, I bought a used pair of the brown ones several months back from Poshmark and the leather is totally different on them, same exact style of boot. These seem like that Belvedered leather, if you are familiar. Not my favorite but I would still recommend the boot. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Adizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!! They are so comfortable. I usually wear size 7 1/2 I wear a 7 in these. Boots are very well made!
customer_reviews.author: TRE

customer_reviews.title: I love these booties
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties. They are surprisingly comfortable and well made as I expect for Fryes. The sole is a bit thinner than I expected, but its not a problem. I love Frye and have never been let down. It will be interesting to see how these hold up compared to my harness boots.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed Smell like pecueca
customer_reviews.text: The color is not the same as shows on the picture. These shoes are already used for someone else !!! I paid for NEW shoes. very disappointed Smell like pecueca!!!
customer_reviews.author: La Diva de Texas

customer_reviews.title: A Wardrobe Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Versatility is the name of the game! These gorgeous boots go with skinny jeans, dress slacks or short skirts! And they fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Mimieux

customer_reviews.title: No Where Near Frye Cognac
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I would I give this product ZERO stars. These are no where near the cognac color that Frye carries in their Made in Mexico boots. The picture does not truly reflect the color that they are. Needless to say, I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and worth the money spent. Comfortable and stylish. Buy them if you have an opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Chiaidez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite booties ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS. Since I got them, I've worn them 3-4 times a week. They're great with tights and dresses. They're great with pants. They're comfortable and fairly dressy. I wish I had them in brown and grey too.
customer_reviews.author: lindsayE

customer_reviews.title: great boot wear
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very good looking,and I was surprise I was so comfortable.my foot has changed over the years it's hard to be comfortable in most shoes or boots,however I always put Dr.schools in my foot wear.
customer_reviews.author: SHARMAGNE MOON

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these boots. I can wear these all day, which is a first for this size heel. They look great and work well with a skirt. These are my first experience with Frye boots and if they hold up anywhere near as well as I expect, label me a convert to the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie Holman

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my Frye Carson Wedge boots. They are comfy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: AZGran

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 and they fit perfectly (even with a thick sock). In addition. They are very attractive with a skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Lesi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite booties! Comfortable, great look, love the color and just stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots feel so amazing on my feet. They are probably the most comfortable wedge boot I have ever purchased. I teach school and have worn them all day at work with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ardina p

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Super super comfortable!!! First day I wore them 10 hours and feet felt great. Soft leather, they are worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh, I love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo nice!!!! They are always my go to booties. I absolutely adore them. Worth EVERY penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary chustz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I had been eyeing them for a while, but couldn't bring myself to pay full price for these. To my luck, they were a "deal of the day". I jumped at the opportunity to get these at more than 50% off list price. I have worn these a handful of times already. They are beautiful & comfortable. Not too high of a wedge. So very happy with my purchase. Beautiful brown bootie. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I wore these with a winter dress and got lots of compliments! Very comfy right out of the box, and the opening was not to narrow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Style Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love Frye the boots!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair of Frye boots! My feet are wide so they are a little tight but that will be fine because they are leather. But I do love, love the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected and are comfortable. However, the bottoms are really smooth and can be a fall risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, so incredibly comfortable. I have them in black and decided to come back for the brown before they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These booties are great! I've never owned a pair of Frye boots until my friend recommended this exact pair to me. They are comfortable and really cute. I get lots of compliments every time I wear them. I'm happy with them because I feel like I could walk around in them for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cassano

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot!! Can wear all day with ease. Looks great with skinny jeans and leggings. Worth every penny. I will be buying more of this brand in different styles.
customer_reviews.author: Baked Kibbeh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like these even better in person. I’d been thinking of buying these for at least three years, but they were a little more than what I wanted to spend. I made the jump and was not disappointed. Beautiful leather and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Although comfortable, my feet got tired after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a "head-turner"! Although comfortable, my feet got tired after a few hours, but they didn't hurt. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots. They are just the right heel height and the leather feels amazing. The zipper up the back makes the "work boot" feel like a "going out" boot. Great comfort and design
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a four because they have no grip and ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a four because they have no grip and the zipper rubs on the back of my leg creating a sore spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish and comfy wedge bootie!
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish and comfy wedge bootie! However after reading the reviews, I decided to go a half size smaller, so I ordered a 7.5 (normally I'm an 8) They were too small for me and I had trouble zipping the back zipper up, so now I'm sending them back for a size 8. Other than that, the quality and materials are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of the same boot. I love these, so comfortable and really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots. I want to buy them in the brown and I'd order another black pair just to have a backup when these wear out! absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Get both colors you’ll love them so much
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the comfort in these adorable shoes! I was quite happy with the leather quality & overall craftsmanship of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ariana M. Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I wear a 7. Ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These booties are perfect for work. I can wear them all day they are extremely comfortable!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable for Frye boots! They're cushiony and lightweight and super cute with rolled up jeans
customer_reviews.author: Creekwood

customer_reviews.title: Very cumphy and nice boots. True to size in fitting
customer_reviews.text: Very cumphy and nice boots. True to size in fitting. My only complaint is the color showing on line is not the color I received. It's a much lighter brown than in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, I wear them with jeans and dresses. They were comfortable from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: smartin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would love these boots before I ordered. I own them in cognac. They’re one of the most comfortable wedge shoes I’ve ever worn. They fit true to size. Super cute, can wait to rock this new pair. Just waiting on my waterproofer spray.
customer_reviews.author: ktni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife tells me these are more comfortable than tennis shoes. She couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable wedge boots! True to size and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra T

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! My first frye boots and they are very comfortable. These are not the cognac color that I was expecting however. They are more of a dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: KH3

customer_reviews.title: I loved the style otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The boot fits, but the leather around the ankle was too large and felt really awkward. I loved the style otherwise, and that may be the way it's intended, but just not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect to my normal size. Very comfortable and cute. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, comfort and fit. We have many pairs of Frye boots and we love them all.
customer_reviews.author: NYCLion

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The leather feels soft and broken in, the shoes are very comfortable and extremely cute! I love them. I'm buying them in brown too!
customer_reviews.author: Windsor, Ca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love my boots!!! and LOVED getting them on sale too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Holt

customer_reviews.title: Their Frye’s  are the best
customer_reviews.text: They look and fit and feel great best boots ever
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leather is nice and soft, making it a comfy boot
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Momma

customer_reviews.title: Well made & comfortable too!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these boots well made, they are extremely comfortable. I was hesitant to spend that much money on a pair of boots for myself, but I am so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are soooooo comfortable! They can be worn all day. I would definitely recommend these fabulous, stylish shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jelli76

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I get complements on them all the time! I even wear them with suits because they are that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these boots and the color is awesome. Dress up or dress down.
customer_reviews.author: GettingBetter

customer_reviews.title: Classic Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have these in brown and black, best boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: bookreadereverydayallday

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I can wear them with just about anything. The bottom of the soles are slick, so be careful. Or but some of those sick on grips.
customer_reviews.author: brooke wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are so comfortable and I can easily wear them ALL day. And, the leather is such great quality! You've done it again FRYE! Love, love, love you!
customer_reviews.author: MDJD

customer_reviews.title: Great booties!!!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are amazing!!! Super comfortable and very stylish, I wear them as often as I can. Highly recommended. Well done, Frye.
customer_reviews.author: AArand

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of Frye boots so I didn't know what to expect. I am extremely happy the purchase! I normally wear a size 7 so that's what I bought and the fit is perfect, they are so comfortable and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Danielle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made with soft leather. They go with every outfit and worth every penny! Very comfortable! I'm a teacher and made it through the day comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are comfortable and supper cute
customer_reviews.text: They fit exactly how I would want them too. After maybe 4 wears the soles started falling apart and the zipper over the heel is impossibly hard to zip. Other than that they are comfortable and supper cute.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: It is just so comfortable that I can wear it all day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Althought somewhat large, It is just so comfortable that I can wear it all day and it matchs legging or jeans perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love and super comfortable.This is my second pair pair. I have both the Black wedge bootie and the Brown wedge bootie.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Bywater

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich color and peefect fit. I'm ordering the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: amc2003

product_meta.title: FRYE Women's Carson Wedge Bootie
product_meta.description: The sophisticated look of the Carson Wedge Bootie from Frye® will blend perfectly with both professional and more casual looks. Washed antique full grain leather upper with a hand-burnished finish. Back zip closure for easy on and off. Smooth leather lining. Lightly cushioned leather footbed for added comfort. Wrapped leather wedge. Leather outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 2 1⁄2 in Weight: 12 oz Circumference: 11 in Shaft: 6 1⁄2 in Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Pebbled ankle boot featuring covered wedge and rear-zip entry
